title: [Bug]: References to some mysterious "LiveLogger" still exist in MSBuild
body:
### Issue Description

We still refer to LiveLogger in places in our code like [here](https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/blob/2c5c951d631c0dc58a1c7a2d0780c475a91a81e6/src/MSBuild/XMake.cs#L3367). We should probably replace those with TerminalLogger.

### Steps to Reproduce

Open MSBuild
Look at code

### Expected Behavior

No LiveLogger, FancyLogger, CurrentLogger, FutureLogger, ModernLogger, BetterLogger references

### Actual Behavior

LiveLogger references found!

### Analysis

_No response_

### Versions & Configurations

_No response_
